name: POWER BEAT RACER
description:
Quick! Collect POWER ORBS to sustain your ships power level, drop to zero and it's game over! Can you go the distance in this radical rhythm game that's a blast to the future ? ?

- Switch lanes with the arrow keys!
- Collect POWER ORBS with the respective buttons!
- GO THE DISTANCE!!

please note that this game was made for Ludum Dare 39, and thus may be quite buggy and rough around the edges. I hope you enjoy!
